mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_no, user_id, total_amount, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no AS orderNo, user_id AS userId, total_amount AS totalAmount, status, create_time AS createdAt, update_time AS updatedAt FROM `order` WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, order_no AS orderNo, user_id AS userId, total_amount AS totalAmount, status, create_time AS createdAt, update_time AS updatedAt FROM `order` WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
